markdownRemark.html: PROJ: BRGY, in partnership with local government units (LGUs), is a social network tailor-made specifically for the masses. The users are always in the loop regarding the current projects, issues, updates, and events in their designated barangays. The E-Services feature allows them to request for Barangay Clearance, Business Permits, and Katarungang Pambarangay Services at the tip of their fingers. The users can also voice out their concerns by sending reports, feedbacks, inquiries, and complaints. Through this feature, LGUs could immediately provide emergency response and action plan to fulfill their concerns.
